By using our services, you agree to the processing of your data by Google in accordance with their privacy policy.

rightsText: You have the right to access, correct, delete, restrict the processing of your personal data, object to processing, and the right to data portability. Please contact us at mail@matbakh.app.
storageText: Your data will only be stored as long as necessary for the purposes stated or as required by statutory retention periods.
changesText: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy as necessary.
